short_description: caring gifts is a gift shop based in concord, new hampshire, united states.
long_description: at caring gifts, located in convenient downtown concord, nh our staff helps you design a very distinctive gift, one that reflects you, your company or organization. we specialize in creativity, and have assembled very special gifts and gift baskets, from one to ten thousand for individual and corporate clients throughout the country. let us design a packaging concept that will make you or your company say what you want to say. we work with you to put it all together in the most creative, appropriate and cost effective way possible. we offer an incredible range of options from dried floral arrangements to fine brass and crystal. wines, champagnes, candies, chocolates and coffees can be selected from our gourmet food department. we are here to help you send a gift that shows you care. perhaps most importantly, we make your gift giving fun. visit us at our convenient downtown concord, nh location. consistantly voted #1 gift shop in concord monitor's "best of" event.

generated_description: caring gifts is a gift shop located in downtown concord, new hampshire. the company specializes in creative gift giving, offering a wide selection of gift baskets and other unique gift ideas. caring gifts provides a range of products including chocolates, candies, balloons, gourmet foods, and baby items. they cater to both individual and corporate clients, helping them design distinctive gifts that reflect their message. the shop has been recognized for its excellence, winning the new hampshire magazine award for "best gift baskets in new hampshire" and consistently being voted the #1 gift shop in concord by the concord monitor.
